headline.main: Video: The Inspiration for Ben & Jerry’s Bernie Sanders Ice Cream

snippet: Ben Cohen and Jerry Greenfield, the ice cream makers, detailed the inspiration for their new flavor, Bernie’s Yearning, named for the Democratic presidential candidate who represents their home state of Vermont in the Senate.
abstract: Ben Cohen and Jerry Greenfield, the ice cream makers, detailed the inspiration for their new flavor, Bernie’s Yearning, named for the Democratic presidential candidate who represents their home state of Vermont in the Senate.
